pages.text: The Demon Realm contains various demons, each with different effects.
Basic demons are the most common form of lesser demon. They drop searing flesh.
Strong demons are a less common form of lesser demon. They move slowly, but pack quite a punch. They drop a lot of searing flesh.
Beast demons are a less common form of lesser demon. They move very quickly and can surround you easily. They drop searing flesh and a demonic tooth.
Searing flesh is dropped by most lesser demons from the demon realm. This includes those that can be summoned with a ritual of demonic summoning.
Demonic Teeth are dropped by beast-type demons in the demon realm.
